args:
Veronica is seduced into receiving the power
of black mana in order to regain her memory
and immediately falls under its sway. In order
to save her, the party is forced to take up arms
against her.
You are most welcome indeed\nat our fortress, Lady Veronica.
Fair enough. My name is Harle, faithful\nattendant to the great Dyrenell Empress.
Dyrenell is the name of the people\nwho were chasing me.
Why, that was just a misunderstanding!\nWe only came to pick you up.
You'll have to bear with us, I fear.\nLike any large organization, we have\nour fair share of bone-headed underlings.
I will never forget how you chased me.
Now now! There's no need for such chill.\nAfter all, the Empress herself has selected\nyou for a most supreme honor.
All I want are my memories.\nNothing else matters.
Can you restore them or not?
But of course. Me? Trick you?\nI would never dream of it, dear!
The true you has an unfathomable power.\nAnd right now, that power is sleeping\nwithin you—along with your memories.
So if we restore your power,\nyour memories should return with it.
What do you want me to do?
Nothing too onerous! I simply need you\nto agree to receive a certain power.
Tee hee! Oh, just a liiiiittle bit of the\npower the Empress entrusted to me!
In our world, this is a powerful force\nknown as ＂black mana.＂
If you take some for yourself, it should\nresonate with your true power.
Princess Veronica and Loki came this way.
If I am not mistaken, there is a\nDyrenell Empire fortress just ahead.
If we're looking to storm a fort, we must\ncome up with a proper plan of attack.
It's smoke! And not the good kind!\n...Wait, IS there a good kind?
Veronica! I'm relieved to see you well!
What the crap does that have to do\nwith her taking a shot at Alfonse?!
The Askran Kingdom is at war\nwith the Emblian Empire.
Supposing she has regained her memory,\nshe'd likely view him as an enemy.
There is more going on here than mere\npolitical quarrel. It's almost as if the\nprincess is caught in a waking nightmare.
Damn, she's just firin' at anyone she sees!
Why would Princess Veronica have\nblack mana?
Why, because she desired it, of course!
Because Princess Veronica is an honored\nguest of the noble Dyrenell Empire!
Are you saying we were all brought\nto this world by YOUR doing?!

Good heavens, no! I don't have the
ridiculous kind of power that would take.
However, I DO have something of a
trusty collaborator on my side...
Tee hee! This world is rather interesting...\nand the empress is SO wonderful.
If I tell you, we won't have any fun.\nYou'll have to waaaaait!
We need to do something about Veronica\nbefore we worry about Loki.
We've seen dragons that have gone wild\nfrom the effects of black mana.
If Veronica is in the same state...
Can we return her to her senses?
Possibly, but we'll have to fight her\nand exhaust the supply of black mana.
To think I must battle her in this world\nas well... Truly, fate is capricious!
Your fate is to fight each other?\nThat's terrible!
She and I exist as light and dark.\nI suspect this is merely our destiny.
Maybe it's like that in your world,\nbut in THIS world, we can change it.
You are correct—this is no time\nfor succumbing to timidity.
I made a vow to save you, Princess,\nand I will hold to that vow now!
